response: "{ \"title\": \"Easy: Sum of Digits\", \"description\": \"Write a function `sum_of_digits` that takes an integer as input and returns the sum of its digits.\\n\\n#### Function Signature\\n```python\\ndef sum_of_digits(n: int) -> int:\\n```\\n\\n#### Input\\n- `n` (int): A non-negative integer.\\n\\n#### Output\\n- Returns the sum of the digits in the input integer.\", \"code\": \"def sum_of_digits(n: int) -> int:\\n    return sum(int(digit) for digit in str(n))\\n\", \"tests\": [\"assert sum_of_digits(123) == 6\", \"assert sum_of_digits(45) == 9\", \"assert sum_of_digits(0) == 0\", \"assert sum_of_digits(-1) == None\"] }"
